query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: CRREM Retrofit Policy Harmonisation Roadmap
result.description: Development of a “European Retrofit Harmonisation Roadmap”. This will synthesize the material from D5.2 and D5.3 and identify strategies for European Countries to move towards a more harmonised property retrofit support system. The Roadmap will recognise pre-existing scenarios, constraints and concomitant policy initiatives to devise a bespoke yet co-ordinated set of policy advice for altering, developing and introducing energy efficiency policy to improve the ability of European jurisdictions.

result.title: WeObserve Cookbook: Guidelines for creating successful and sustainable Citizens Observatories
result.description: WeObserve Cookbook: Guidelines for creating successful and sustainable Citizens Observatories. This deliverable will capture the lessons on best practices as well as the insights on barriers for COs and how these can be addressed, detailing strategies for interoperability and standards, engagement strategies and co-design of COs, capture the impacts of COs and include the lessons from CoPs 4 and 5. Linked to Task 2.3
